name: Save The Last Angel
description:
Warning: This game is made to penetrate through your soul.

Hell is taking over the heaven and there's only one angel left!

Trap demons in fake heavens and destroy them to delay the process of heaven turning to hell!

Your mission: Save the last angel!

Your weapon: "Alt + Ctrl + Delete"!

This game is my submission for GBTK game jam.

And it's only playable on windows for obvious reasons.
